text: The pizza was very good, the establishment was clean, and the customer service was on point. One of the employees even came to our table to check on how our meal was and ask if she could do anything for us. I was very pleased with the experience.

text: I was not expecting to like the pizza that much. The crust was good and the sauce was amazing. text: Amazing pizza and the price is always worth the buy. I will be forever grateful to this company for coming up with a wonderful idea.

text: It's hard no to go back for more blaze pizza. The fact that you don't have to wait for a long time for your pizza is definitely a win.
